member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord
member.summary: This class represents a record.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the record id.

member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.DateOfBirth
member.summary: Gets or sets the person's date of birth.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Gender
member.summary: Gets or sets the gender of the person.
member.value: The gender of the person. 'M' - male, 'F' - female.

member.summary: Gets or sets the experience of person.

member.name: P:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecord.Salary
member.summary: Gets or sets the salary of the person.

member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: This class represents a file-cabinet. It stores records and allows you create, edit and search them.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetRecords
member.summary: This method returns number of stored records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: This method returns array of stored records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: This method performs searching records by first name.
member.returns: The array of records with matched first name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: This method performs searching records by last name.
member.returns: The array of records with matched last name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: This method performs searching in records by date of birth.
member.returns: The array of records with matched date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(FileCabinetApp.RecordParameters)
member.summary: This method creates a new record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,FileCabinetApp.RecordParameters)
member.summary: This method creates a new record.
